title: Redis Configuration
description: Configuration for Redis connection, stream names, pub/sub channels, and job management.

streams.description: List of Redis streams used by the bridge.

control.description: Stream for advertising jobs at control plane.

data.description: Stream for advertising jobs at data plane.

channels.description: List of pub/sub channels used by the bridge.

progress.description: Channel onto which jobs publish their progress (e.g. 'channel:progress').

status.description: Channel onto which jobs publish their status (e.g. 'channel:status').

data.description: Channel onto which jobs publish intermediate generic data (e.g. 'channel:data').

ttl.description: Job keys TTL in Redis, in seconds (e.g. 43200 for 12 hours).

pipelines.description: List of mappings of available jobs supported by the Redis bridge, to worker tasks.

PROCESS.description: Planner request type for creating execution pipelines for generic graphs.

FIXED.description: Planner request type for creating execution pipelines from workflows registry.
